name: Space Station Survival
description:
Space Station Survival:

Description:

Space Station Survival, kill Aliens on a Space Station and survive each level to move onto the next. Collect Power-Ups to improve your chances of survival, and don't die.

Aim:

Survive each level for 2 minutes to move on, get as many kills as possible to get the highest score you can possible.

Controls:

In-Game

How to Play:

Download the executable file and folders.
